00069 int RainbruRPG::Network::NetPacketBase::convert(int i){
00070 #if __BYTE_ORDER == __LITTLE_ENDIAN
00071   return i;
00072 #elif __BYTE_ORDER == __BIG_ENDIAN
00073   return GINT_TO_LE(i);
00074 #else
00075 # error "Please fix <bits/endian.h>"
00076 #endif
00077 }

00102 void RainbruRPG::Network::NetPacketBase::
00103 setData(enet_uint8* d, size_t len){
00104   // Copy 2 bytes to get the packet identifier
00105   memcpy(&data->data, d, 2);
00106   id=static_cast<RainbruRPG::Network::tNetPacketIdentifier>
00107     GUINT16_FROM_LE(data->packetIdentifier);
00108 }

00117 const char* RainbruRPG::Network::NetPacketBase::
00118 typeToString(tNetPacketIdentifier t){
00119 
00120   const char* ret;
00121 
00122   switch(t){
00123   case NPI_GEN_IDENT :
00124     ret="Identification";
00125     break;
00126 
00127   case NPI_SVR_CONRESP:
00128     ret="Server connection response";
00129     break;
00130 
00131   case NPI_INVALID:
00132     ret="Unset";
00133     break;
00134 
00135   default:
00136     ret="Error";
00137     break;
00138   }
00139 
00140   return ret;
00141 }
